x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: A unified emergency management platform could reduce response time by up to 50%, saving resources and potentially lives.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: During emergencies (natural disasters, cyberattacks, health crises), communication and resource coordination between departments and responders can be chaotic and slow
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A ServiceNow-based incident coordination hub that centralizes alerts, task assignments, and status tracking for all teams. It uses AI to suggest actions, manage resource allocation, and trigger automated notifications to relevant stakeholders.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Emergency Response Management
Incident Management
Flow Designer for automation
Now Assist for AI-driven suggestions

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Scalability during large incidents and ensuring data accuracy under high-stress conditions
